pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pretty logs for local development... code-block:: python pip install readable-log-formatterProvides the class ``readable_log_formatter.ReadableFormatter`` to be usedwith Python's logging:.. code-block:: python import logging from readable_log_formatter import ReadableFormatter log = logging.getLogger() log.setLevel(logging.INFO) hndl = logging.StreamHandler() hndl.setFormatter(ReadableFormatter()) log.addHandler(hndl).. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ipmb/readable-log-formatter/master/.screenshot.png :alt: readable-log-formatter screenshot
